rename.from: @BeforeAll method in super class skipped when it has same name as a @BeforeEach method in subclass
rename.to: `@BeforeAll` method in super class skipped when it has same name as a `@BeforeEach` method in subclass

body:
Thanks for raising the issue.

I have confirmed that this is a bug.

We'll look into it.

At a quick glance, the cause of the issue appears to be due to the fact that `org.junit.platform.commons.util.ReflectionUtils.streamMethods(...)` first invokes `findAllMethodsInHierarchy(...)` and then filters based on the `isAnnotated(...)` predicate **afterwards**.

Whereas, for such use cases, we would need to apply the predicate **while** searching the hierarchy for methods. If we did that, `b.B.before()` would not "hide" `a.A.before()` which is currently the case.

issue.title: Apply method predicate before searching type hierarchy

repository.name: junit-framework
repository.description: ✅ The programmer-friendly testing framework for Java and the JVM

body: **Update**: I put together a proof-of-concept fix in #3500.

issue.body:
## Overview

This PR includes a fix for #3532 with two simple test classes that demonstrate the issue.

## Related Issues

- #3498
- #3532

### Deliverables

- [x] Fix the bug
- [x] Add "formal" tests in `ReflectionUtilsTests` and `AnnotationUtilsTests`
- [x] Document in the Release Notes

issue.title: Harmonize method filter and field filter application in search algorithms

repository.name: junit-framework
repository.description: ✅ The programmer-friendly testing framework for Java and the JVM

issue.body:
## Overview

After completing #3532, I noticed that the changes made in conjunction with #3498 do not apply the predicate as consistently as in #3532.


## Related Issues

- #3498
- #3532

## Deliverables

- [x] Consistently apply method predicate in search algorithms analogous to the application of field predicates.

issue.title: Harmonize application of method and field filters in search algorithms

repository.name: junit-framework
repository.description: ✅ The programmer-friendly testing framework for Java and the JVM

issue.body:
This PR consistently applies method predicates in search algorithms analogous to the application of field predicates.

- See #3498
- See #3532
- Closes #3534
